thread.title: Christopher Schwer
thread.title_full: Premium Mortgage reviewed by Christopher Schwer

author: Christopher Schwer
title: Christopher Schwer
text: My experience with Donna Maxwell and Premium mortgage has always been incredibly professional and extraordinarily responsive to the needs of my clients. When I instruct a new buyer to call Donna I always tell them that she is very responsive and this has always been the case. I look forward to may more mortgage transactions with Premium Mortgage. 5 Stars!
